title: Designing a Device to Help Farmers Adapt to Climate Change (Concept)
description: Designing a low-cost weather forecasting device for farmers without the need to read anything, inly through blinking lights. A winning article I wrote for Predictable Designs, a hardware and product development blog.
awards: Winner: Most Innovative Project - Predictable Designs

title: Visualizing How European Countries Voted in Eurovision from 2012 to 2017
description: Which countries voted which countries in Eurovision? A fun personal project using Processing.
role: ROLE: Passion project - research/data analysis, design & development

title: Learning Electronics Made Fun With Visual Cheatsheets
description: TinkrPostr was made out of boredom. The ever technical electronics made not boring anymore with eye-catching and engaging visual material.
